title: PM presented Rs 8 mln donation cheque from Sialkot Chamber of Commerce
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 19 (APP): Minister for Commerce Syed Naveed Qamar called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif here on Wednesday and presented him with a donation cheque of Rs 8 million for the PMâ€™s Relief Fund for Earthquake Victims of Turkiye and Syria.
The minister presented the cheque on behalf of the donation by the Sialkot Chamber of Commerce and Industries.
Defence Minister Khwaja Asif was also present.
